name: CreateStream
description: Request the creation of a stream with given configuration. Stream's are unique within a Stream Viewer per StreamId and Inference output type combination. Target the correct Stream Viewer by setting the FlowId of this DataSample to the ContextId of the Stream Viewer.

tags.name: stream_id
tags.description: The streamId that the Stream Viewer should read Vision data from.

tags.name: inference_output_type
tags.description: What kind of Inference Engine output type to apply to the stream.
